titleStmt.title: A true ministery anatomized Where it is clearly proved by scripture, I. What a true ministery is, and what a ministery God set in the church. II. A ministery not so set, is not the ministery of Christ. III. Our ministers of England have not the gift of tongues. IV. Truth is not obtained by studie. By Thomas Lipeat, not the author, but the actor.
titleStmt.author: Lipeat, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. and are to be sold at the Black Spread-Eagle at the West-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black Spread-Eagle at the West-end of Pauls
